1.0.name: wordpress/miiplus-button
1.0.description:
MiiPlus is a FREE service which allow you to add a button to your website. Similar to the Facebook like button, but user is not required to login in order to "like" your page. Everyone can Plus themselves on the page without any registration and login.

This plugin allow you to add the MiiPlus button into every post or every page of your wordpress.

Main Features

  • Show the button into every pages or posts or both.
  • Show the button before or after the content.
  • Control the button show on left or right.
  • Able to disable the button on individual page or post.
  • 4 modes of button to choose. (User, Love, Hate, Read)
  • 8 Styles of button to choose. (Default, White, Black, Blue, Green, Grey, Red, Yellow)
  • 4 Sizes of button to choose. (15px, 20px, 24px, 60px)
